on hat w/ natural chain 2 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook remove hook from that loop insert hook into the 1st single_crochet made then pick up the dropped loop from the 4th single_crochet and pull through finish off leaving 6 tail sew to point of hat beard row 1 w/ natural join w/ slip_stitch in 1st free loop of round 27 chain 2 slip_stitch in next st across row 2-9 chain 1 turn slip_stitch in 1st chain 2 space chain 2 slip_stitch in next chain 2 space across finish off weave in ends embroider eyes and nose if desired terminology abbreviation full term chain chain decrease
